dialogue:
[speed value:ultrafast]
[opacity value:semi]Kid 1:
[opacity value:regular] 
Hey mister, I heard it's very dangerous out 
there, full of monsters!
[endl value:2]
Are you bringing powerful 
[color value:blue]cards[color value:regular] 
with you? Our dad says I can't leave until 
I learn how to use cards...
name: Kid 1
